source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot looking down into the murky, greenish water of a swimming pool. The bottom is lined with a grid of small, square tiles, with a darker, wet-looking patch visible in the center. The scene is largely static with very subtle water movement.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot looking down into the murky, greenish water of a swimming pool. The bottom is lined with a grid of small, square tiles, with a darker, wet-looking patch visible in the center. The scene is largely static with very subtle water movement.

generated_critique: The caption should be revised for conciseness and accuracy. The introductory phrase "This is a scenery shot" is meta-commentary and should be removed to make the description more direct. Additionally, describing the patch on the tiles as "wet-looking" is redundant, as the entire scene is underwater; "darker patch" is a more precise and concise alternative. The description of the scene and the lack of motion can be combined into a more streamlined sentence or two.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A view from above looks down into the murky, greenish water of a swimming pool. The bottom is covered in small, square tiles, with a darker patch in the center. The scene is mostly still, with only very subtle water movement.
